Character.Description: The desperate leader of a village plagued by bandits
A scout who watches the roads for easy prey
A brutal fighter who keeps the other bandits in line
A ruthless gang leader who rules through fear and strength
A merchant being held for ransom by the bandits
A community member concerned about the prophet's influence
A charismatic figure who claims divine enlightenment
A true believer who defends the prophet absolutely
Someone who once believed but now has doubts
A warrior sworn to protect the prophet
An academic who has been investigating the prophet
A collector of oddities who acquired an unusual map
An expert on local history and ancient sites
A recluse who has lived in the wilds for decades
Another seeker who has heard rumors of the cache
An ancient construct protecting the treasure
A wanderer who collects and shares legends
The last living practitioner of an ancient sword art
One who sought the technique and was found unworthy
Another who seeks to learn the lost technique
An elder who knows the old paths
An elderly woman whose precious family heirloom was stolen
A neighbor who noticed something suspicious that night
A masterless warrior driven to theft by hard times
A dealer who trades in goods of questionable origin
A wise elder leading their people to safety
A determined youth who wants to protect their people
A skilled healer who tends to the group's wounds
A mysterious person who joined the refugees recently
A child who got separated from the group
A hunter tracking the refugees
The leader of those hunting the refugees
A guard at the safe territory border
The calculating leader of your merchant association
The muscle behind the guild's operations
Leader of the opposing guild, ruthless and cunning
The rival guild's second-in-command
A shadowy figure who sells information to both sides
A neutral official who can mediate between the guilds
A brutal enforcer for the rival guild
A shrewd trader who travels the dangerous roads between towns
A gruff checkpoint guard who demands payment for passage
A desperate criminal who preys on travelers
A local merchant eager for fresh goods
A representative of a merchant guild with deep pockets
A welcoming host who knows all the local gossip
